statement.p: A coffee distributor plans to mix some Ethiopian coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${11.10} per pound with some Arabian Mocha coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${13.20} per pound to create \displaystyle{60} pounds of a new coffee blend that will sell for \displaystyle\${11.28} per pound.
How many pounds of each kind of coffee should they mix? Round to the nearest pound.
